item.title: Communication between R and d3js
item.description: Hello everyone, In this post we will focus on how to send a message from R to javascript. More precisely, we will focus on the basic keywords and knowledge to integrate a d3.js graph into shiny, just like here. If you have any issue to make shiny and javascript communicate after reading this post, I suggest you to go back to this simple shiny app from Rstudio.
